page.title: 19TOURISM
page.content: The main tourist attractions of our area are{Rookley Country Park, horse {riding and lovely country walks.}To make life easy for the walkers/riders, pathways and bridleways are well marked; maps showing this information can be bought from the I.O.W. Tourist Centre in Newport. Leaflets giving detailed instructions to ramblers who want to follow the Worsley Trail or Shepherds Trail which cross our area can also be obtained. North Appleford farmhouse has been converted into holiday cottages; these cottages are ideal for those "who want to get away from it all". A car would be needed to drive up the long lane, and there is no bus service nearby. Rookley Country Park and the horse riding facilities have been described in detail on earlier pages(see pages 17,04 and 18).
